document_data.name: Abordabe
document_data.mainbody: '''Abordabe''' was the chieftain of the largest tribe in [[Narfell]] in [[1359 DR]], the [[Abordabe|Adordabe]].
document_data.Activities: Abordabe supervised the massive [[Trade Fair]] each summer. All his tribesmen considered him the best warrior of Narfell and few tried to challenge him.
document_data.Personality: Abordabe was an honorable individual, wise and tolerant to outsiders (for a [[Nar (ethnicity)|Nar]]). However, he did not want to abandon power despite his old age.
